        merges the difference attributes into the target

        returns the real changes performed on target in diff

        Parameters:
        target - the attributes to merge the difference in
        change - the attributes to change
        diff - output of real changes that were made

      • mergeAttributes

        public static void mergeAttributes(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Variant> target,
                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Variant> diff,
                   boolean initial)
        merges the attribute differences. But respects the initial flag sent by many events. in the case the difference is flagged initial the target will be cleared first. This is a convenient method to easy the merge.
        Parameters:
        target - the attributes to merge the difference in
        diff - the difference attributes
        initial - initial flag

      • set

        public static void set(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Variant> target,
       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Variant> attributes,
       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Variant> diff)
        update the target attributes to contain only the requested attributes
        Parameters:
        target - the attributes to update the difference to
        attributes - the new attributes set
        diff - the actual difference

        Generate the difference between two maps
        Parameters:

        target - the target map
